website_summaries.verdict: The design and build offer everything you'd expect in a quality road bicycle for women.
pros: Offered in 2 sizes and color schemes
Good build quality with lightweight aluminum frame and tough carbon fiber fork
Works well for intermediate and novice riders
Sharp-looking bike you'll love riding long distances
cons: More expensive than you might expect
Not really made for taller women

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy any large purchases on amazon
customer_reviews.text: I would buy ANY large purchase from this seller or Amazon for that matter. There is a rigid 30 day return policy- and in cases of larger purchases- bikes, TVs, etc- it doesn’t seem to matter if you purchase a lemon. Your stuck with it. We bought a bike through this seller and the chain falls off every other time we use it- plus it came with a faulty tire that we had to replace within a few weeks. The seller will not return due to the 30 day return policy- and now we are stuck with a bike that doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Lovelife

customer_reviews.title: This is hands down the best bang for your buck road bike on the market
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best bang for your buck road bike on the market! I did a lot of research before buying this bike and it stacks up against bikes more than twice the price! The aluminum frame and carbon fork ride like a dream! I road it on a 50 mile ride this past summer among other lengthy journeys and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. As with any bike make sure to check every nut and bolt during assembly. They're not always torqued to spec from the factory. In my case the bottom bracket lock ring needed a little snugging up. If you're looking to get into road biking this is the bike for you!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Pappas

customer_reviews.title: Idk, probably less of a hassle if you buy directly from schwinn! They would be more helpful
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I feel about this purchase. 1st, I had to buy it twice bc the first time I bought it, the same item went was discounted nearly $50. Amazon wouldn’t accommodate the price difference so I had to repurchase. 2nd, on the manufacturing end, the bike is pretty dope, but for roughly $600 amazon or schwinn could’ve put an L wrench in the bundle. Finally, I get that for hardcore cyclists this bike isn’t crazy expensive but for a casual biker, for my money I at least hoped everything worked BUT I had to take it to a local bike shop (paid more money) to fix the brakes BC NEITHER WORKED!!!! VERY FRUSTRATED.
customer_reviews.author: anna eskander

customer_reviews.title: Great bicycle
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a bicycle enthusiast or a spandex wearing, reflective sunglass gleaming, sleek shelled helmet wearing, water bottle squirting professional cyclist. I'm a t-shirt and shorts, regular sneaker toting, no water bottle investing, just wanted a bicycle kind of guy. I love the bike, its great on the road. I removed the goofball straps on the peddles because I don't need that kind of thing. I watched youtube on how to tune the brakes and gears and did it myself. The bike was easy enough to assemble but time consuming as I didn't want to make any mistakes.
customer_reviews.author: k k

customer_reviews.title: Great overall, minor problems
customer_reviews.text: This is my first road bike and I must say, I love it. The color scheme is gorgeous, assembly was relatively easy (took me about 1 hour), and it rides great. My only complaints are that the reflectors that come with each wheel were broken, and on my 3rd or 4th ride, the chain broke completely off! I had to walk the bike to the nearest bike store and buy a new one. Praying that doesn't happen again. Even so, this bike gets 4 out of 5 stars from me!
customer_reviews.author: Marisa Jayakar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for beginners and daily commuters
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to the road bike game. Took some time getting used to it and finding the right fit. Would recommend a professional/ long time biker for the best fit. I’m 5’9” and the bike is perfect for me. The gears work flawlessly and it’s feels really smooth. Brakes are a joke and I swapped them out within a month. The grip was mounted the wrong way, so I had to fix that myself. Assembly was easy for a 1st timer. As always, have it checked by a professional once, a little price to pay for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Dhruv Mishra

customer_reviews.title: Great road bikes for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Those are my first road bikes and they are just great. Have ridden 450 km on them already and they are very comfortable. The aluminium they made of is not as light weighted as the carbon ones but is is good enough for me. Was rather easy to assemble but you'll need Hex keys and a wrench. The pedals are fitted for riding with normal running shoes (no clips for cycling shoes) which was good for me since I didn't want to buy cycling shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Shahar Kasirer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival!
customer_reviews.text: Bike looks great but don’t how it rides yet because I have been able to ride it due to damage. Box was damaged on arrival, obviously not manufacturers fault. But they could do a better job at protecting the bike. Fairly easy to put together, instructions are worthless and make no sense. But not rocket science to figure out on your own. Lastly, front brake barrel adjust was split in two. Therefore, breaks do not work. Contacted warranty company and haven’t heard back in over a week.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Girdler

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike, but take it to a bike shop
customer_reviews.text: Good bike I'm having lots of fun with it, but you have to take it to a professional for a tune up. I was able to put it together but the brakes and wheel alignment needs to be professionally done.
customer_reviews.author: Britt Shin

customer_reviews.title: Its a Schwinn... need I say more?
customer_reviews.text: Its a Schwinn. What else is there to say? They’ve been out since I was a kid and that’s a pretty long time. They make a top of the line product and compromise on nothing. Beautiful bike and fast as heck. Its well worth paying 50-100 more for a premium bike w a flawless and forever reputation.
customer_reviews.author: Rarereviewer

customer_reviews.title: You can't buy a better bike for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This bike arrived today! Out of the box, assembled, tuned and I was riding it less than an hour. I'm far from a bike pro, and I would say for a bike that's less than $500 it is a steal. After a 20 year gap from riding, my kids are older and it's the perfect bike for me. The frame, wheels, crank, shifter, fork, and brake calipers are great quality for a bike at this price point. There are some valid criticisms in other reviews regarding the brake pads, but that is really easy stuff to change. I will update this periodically as I get a chance to put some miles on her.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Goodale

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is my first drop bar road bike, but I've been cycling since I was a gleam in my parents eye. I was able to put it together and get most of the adjustments right. After a couple of weeks I took it to a local bike shop to get it professionally adjusted and it made a huge difference. Of course the owner scoffed at my Chinese made POC, but I didn't want to spend over $600 when I didn't know if I even liked the style. I think it was well worth the money I spent and I'll get at least two years out of it before upgrading.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn in ATL

customer_reviews.title: The Schwinn is a Win!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for my wife. It is perfect for what she needs. She says, "I'm not trying to be a road-bike master, just need something to keep up with my husband." I say, "Great bike for the price." I mean, unless you are a serious racer what more would you need anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: Same components as $900 bikes
customer_reviews.text: Over researched bikes for too long. Compared the components and frame material to a local bike shop's Specialized road bike selling for $900. Components were identical, both have aluminum frames. Great starter bike without breaking the bank. Definitely recommend getting it fully tuned up at a bike shop after assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave-GRMI

customer_reviews.title: Best possible bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Full disclosure: this is my first road bike and I'm not the most knowledgeable about them, but I did do a lot of research on which bike would give me the best bang for the buck and I'm extremely satisfied with this choice. Bike is very sturdy, I've done a couple of 30 mile rides and it went a lot better than I expected. I would recommend this bike to any person at entry level
customer_reviews.author: K. Claypool

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised when I received the bicycle and assembled it. It is excellent quality. Before I bought it I went to a few bicycle shops and bikes with similar specs were in the $800-$900 range. I took a chance at this very low price and it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: BigY

customer_reviews.title: I would likely spend a bit more and get a better product too
customer_reviews.text: An OK bike,but it didn't match the descriptions and sizes posted. Seat is bulky. Chain broke after a year. If I bought another road bike, I would definitely buy one from the local bike store.. The bike is just too personal of an item to me that is important to touch and feel before purchasing. I would likely spend a bit more and get a better product too.
customer_reviews.author: AC1752

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Quality bike at a great price. It has held up well and the tires that came with it are going strong after several months of riding. The only issue I have had is with the seat. It's not a super comfortable seating but you get use to it. I'm 5'9" and this bike fits me well.
customer_reviews.author: Drew Sisco

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product. Also need to replace a part and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product. Also need to replace a part and I was lucky when I called the company they were able to replace it for free and no I have nothing to about. If you need parts ordered for it call the number on the bike frame above the crank lever.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great value, expect to upgrade some components.
customer_reviews.text: For the money, not a bad bike. I ground the bearings out in the pedals after about 200 miles, replaced them with Shimano PD-R540 SPD clip in pedals. Ground the bottom bracket out at about 1500 miles, replaced it -- found out it was too big and that's why I was getting chain rub in the high front gear. Pros: $400! Decent frame, the Shimano claris groupset is pretty good. Cons: Poor quality pedals and bottom bracket. I expect I'll have to replace bearings in the back wheel soon too. I ride 20 - 40 miles a day 5 or 6 days a week on this bike. I do love it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Labrie

customer_reviews.title: Absolute shit, left me stranded in the middle of nowhere multiple times due to unexpected flats
customer_reviews.text: Worst I’ve ever owned, changed 4 tubes, keeps getting punctured, arrived with bent brakes, highly regret the purchase, will sell off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not so great a bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike was almost assembled and did not take any time at all to put together. My son has ridden it for the last 14 months, riding daily from spring through fall and indoors on a stationary. in a years time, the crank axle rusted and crumbled to a point where the crank arm was falling off. The seat's bolt has snapped a few times on a ride, dangerously. expected a lot more durability for a $500 bike.
customer_reviews.author: Balu B

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: This bike came with gears that were stuck and would not shift easily. I had to pay for the modifications to fix the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Mistercane

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: The bike was a little small for me. It also did not ride as well as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Rogers Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bike is broken when arrived
customer_reviews.text: One of the brake cables is too short making it impossible to turn one way... completely breaks the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Standerfer

customer_reviews.title: just received a weird email from this vendor who cancelled order saying due to shipping damage
customer_reviews.text: very odd - reported to BIZ and his name as well. Used weird words like haunting - will be on consumers report
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Pedal threaded out of the crank set the first week of use
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: assembly is ass
customer_reviews.text: brakes are borderline impossible to figure out without help or prior experience and the manual that comes with it is worse than useless
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Relatively good bike but need a lot of work done to work properly.
customer_reviews.text: Relatively light, but feel very sturdy. Assembly is easy enough and doesn't require many tools. However i had to tweak it a lot for it to work properly, but that's gonna be necessary anyway for prolonged use and it teaches me to do maintenance too so no complaints there. It does require having tools for all the things you gonna have to fix though. So that makes it a 4 star buy instead of a 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Duc Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Functional and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I love my bike. I’m an avid runner but want to expand to biking and this bike was everything I needed for a beginner bike. It definitely needs some better brakes, but it’s so pretty and rides really well!
customer_reviews.author: Krissi A

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike bad brakes
customer_reviews.text: Loved it rides nice and looks great. The brakes are terrible however replace those asp.
customer_reviews.author: Postman

customer_reviews.title: Great bicycle for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great bicycle for the price. it is light, responsive and built good. I received the bicycle in good condition and it was fairly easy to put it together. After assembly I had problem with the gears and breaks but after a full tune up at a local bike shop the problem went away. I recommend this bicycle to every beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Aren Boghozian

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. Bought this in June, 2015. I've been riding on this bike for about a thousand miles since then. So far no problems at all whatsoever except for the occasional flat tire that I'm left with. Get a great pump and you don't have this issue anymore. It's lightweight and speedy. Ideal for my daily commutes and trips in the San Francisco Bay Area.
customer_reviews.author: kesslerIO

customer_reviews.title: Minor flaw
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bike but the tubes were bad inside the tires. I bought new ones and haven't had an issue. Overall it remains a great bike for a great price. It will take some time to assemble and adjust brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Baker

customer_reviews.title: Works great. May be a bit loose though
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a couple months, but so far it's been great! The front derailleur is acting weird, however, and I'm getting clicking and friction with the chain. That's probably my fault, but frankly I haven't hit enough bumps to break anything, so it was probably out of alignment to begin with. Not docking any stars though, since it can probably fixed by rotating the derailleur a bit or something. Other than that, it's a great bike!
customer_reviews.author: C M Hanson

customer_reviews.title: " but I am amazed at how much better this bike is on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I had a Wal-Mart special Schwinn for my first "adult bike," but I am amazed at how much better this bike is on the road. It is half the weight, much easier to ride, and much quieter than my other one. Very impressed with the quality of this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for its price,but be aware with delivery,because they damage it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bike for its price,even if its came to me damaged I still enjoying riding it.When you ride it ,it feels really solid(my first road bike so i dont know what to compare to).At first time breaks were making metal scratching sound,but its because breaks are brand new.When youll ride it for a while sound will disapear.Really mast and smooth bike.
customer_reviews.author: Ihar Trehubau

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bike!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bike for my husband who absolutely loves it!!! It's light weight and easy to work the gears. It's a great bike.
customer_reviews.author: MelMsBoston1975

customer_reviews.title: looks good.
customer_reviews.text: I give it a five, because out of the box it was very easy to put together. No damage. I purchased this for my grand, I'm to old to ride it. For the money I couldnt have got any better. When grand comes, I will get him to review it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few rides to get used to the handling but after that I fell in love with this bike. Only thing that I have changed on my bike are new break pads (Kool stops) because the stock breaks are not the best. Other than that this bike is great! Very fast and shifts smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Probably need help assembling portions. Make sure pedals are good
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the bike is good for the price. Pedal mechanism broke in the drive Tain after about 40 miles so had to replace but even with that significantly cheaper then most road bikes. most assembly simple but the gears/shifters were a pain
customer_reviews.author: Simeon

customer_reviews.title: Rides like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Just took the bike for a spin around the neighborhood. Rides like a dream. I had a much more exspensice bike a few years ago but this bike feels so much better. Just goes to show that price doesn't always mean better. I'll be making some upgrades over the next few weeks but until then I'm perfectly happy with the bike. I would recommend it to anyone looking for a road bike to start their riding hobby.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Scott

customer_reviews.title: Expectations met recently
customer_reviews.text: It was really good with that price. Got that satisfaction which was expected. Switching between gear is smooth and also wheel are of good quality. Packaging could have been better but overall it was worth every penny spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Aelish

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with overall appearance and style of this bike. Definitely worth the price. Never used the style shifters that came with it but was very simple to figure out once I started riding. Have yet to come across anything negative so far. I’ll update if something comes up. Packaging was great and the bike was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Knieriem

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Received the bike in a matter of a week of ordering it. It arrived in a big box and was fairly easy to put together. Love how lite the entire bike was. I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good road bike for the casual road cyclist
customer_reviews.text: Nice ride and a good fit for my wife who is 5'2".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful masterwork bike that is very affordable
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful masterwork bike that is very affordable. The aluminum body is of incredible quality. Because of how inexpensive the bike is relative to the materials expect to have to replace the tires, tubes, break pads, and toe cages fairly soon. Within two months of purchase I've replaced all four of those and couldn't be happier. This baby flies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great fun bike
customer_reviews.text: It's a super nice bike. I've enjoyed riding it. Honestly made riding very fun again. I would buy it again it's a great value for what your getting.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Current

customer_reviews.title: High end bike at a low price.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I made the decision to get this bike. I'm 5'9 and I was afraid it wouldn't be the right fit for me. Got it and it's a perfect fit. Looks better than it looks in the pics and rides like a dream. Super light, great gear and brake system. It also comes with a built-in kickstand. For the price, you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Claude M. Pompilus

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Had this bike for less than a month and it spent more time in the repair shop than I did riding it Original bottom bracket bearings were bad and so were the replacement ones Schwinn sent me. Sending it back for a refund. Once the bike was tuned and set-up out of the box, it actually road quite nice....just needed headphones to drown out the bearing noise! Also the cheap plastic rim tape was the cause of several rear flats. Weighs about 27 lbs and looks sharp...seat was nothing great. I'm 5'10 and it fit me perfect. Tried the inexpensive route, but going back to the local bike shop to get something i know will work right out the door.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Derailers are way out of alignment and spokes are loose. From what others have said the frame is a good deal but I will be replacing derailers, rims and seat
customer_reviews.author: MarkH

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level bike
customer_reviews.text: The bike was really easy to put together but the gears will need adjusting from your local bike shop and the chain was a little dry. Other than that Im really satisfied with the bike.
customer_reviews.author: CLWalk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for folks that just want to enjoy getting out ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a 35 year old Schwinn I bought when I was thirty... Gave to my son who lives in a metro and goes to school. The new Schwinn is so smooth and effortless it erases my gain in age. Perfect for folks that just want to enjoy getting out and biking but aren't into wearing "Tour de France Advertisements".
customer_reviews.author: Steven B.

customer_reviews.title: Bargain
customer_reviews.text: Very nice go fast road bike at a great price. Would recommend to a friend. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jerryk

customer_reviews.title: Decent bike with some work.
customer_reviews.text: The bike itself is decent, however it was shipped with a defective tube on the front tire so I needed to replace that before I could ride.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle E

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: A beginner here and found it easy to assemble - came almost completely assembled - and rides nice. Couldn't find a better bike for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Myron Mlachak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have really enjoyed this bike while I've had it. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Williquette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very solid bike. Saved several hundred dollars by going with this one without sacrificing quality.
customer_reviews.author: jmsnegus

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for starters
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for starters, but the breaks are terrible so you might want to plan on getting better brakes. I went down a very steep hill and had to be extremely careful because the brakes could not have stopped me at all. But other than that it's a great bike.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with missing front wheel quick release Lever, 3 broken reflectors. No way to attach front wheel to bike.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Fisher

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the bike
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought this bike as I'm starting to train for triathalons and bike more regularly. I absolutely love the bike, especially for such an affordable cost. It's a great beginner's bike if you're starting out, but don't want to spend a few thousand dollars on a road or tri bike. I'm 5'4 and it's a great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great bike, will need some tune-ups
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace the tube within the first five rides. The brakes will need some tweaking. Other than those two things, I love this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Milford

customer_reviews.title: Came with flat tire
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this seems like a nice bike for the price. Be sure to order extra tubes for the tires. One of the tubes that came with the bike was already flat when I received it. The tube audibly leaked air after pumping it up the first time.
customer_reviews.author: CJaneReview

customer_reviews.title: But it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great and beautiful bike. It ran perfectly and never gave me any issued. The only problem was that it looked too nice. Someone stole it!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Erenas

customer_reviews.title: Best beginner road bike at the price
customer_reviews.text: Its a amazing beginners road bike. Light wt n easy to assemble n maintain. I gave fire stars cause i thought seat could have been much comfortable. Apart from that is worth the price today
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Pishe

customer_reviews.title: A Pleasant Surprise
customer_reviews.text: I once had a top of the line Cannondale racing bike, and for the price, this Schwinn Phocus compares nicely. It's light weight, agile, and fast. The aluminum frame is skillfully welded, its Shimano components not top of the line, but get the job done smoothly and precisely. Set up was easy, and the gearing was already set up perfectly on arrival. The fit and finish are comparable to bikes twice the price, and the aluminum wheels light and strong. This bike is a pleasant surprise, a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Peter V. Owens

customer_reviews.title: so far so good! VERY STURDY
customer_reviews.text: so far so good! VERY STURDY!!! my son even survived with barely a scratch while negligently being hit bY a car while riding it!!!
customer_reviews.author: cajunmom

customer_reviews.title: but I found this easy to assemble and she loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift for my wife, I am not a very experienced cyclist, but I found this easy to assemble and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Stryker

customer_reviews.title: A good entry level road bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Bike a couple of weeks ago for $388. At that price the bike is a fantastic value. At its current price of $460, I'd check to see if a Local Bike Shop had something comparable. The bike is a good bike. My wheels came slightly out of true, and also a couple scratches on the bike. For the price I paid it's fine, a tad crude, a tad unrefined and a little heavy (24lbs). I bought it to use the parts for my titanium frame, I figure I would upgrade to better parts as things wear out (maybe 5-10K miles from now (or about a year or two))
customer_reviews.author: ZT Customs

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the price but the gears have some ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price but the gears have some problems and the front breaks are super annoying because they slide over to the tire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bike for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Runs very smoothly - Gears shift well after a little adjustment - Very good value - Reasonably light weight Cons: - Awkward hood placement on the bars; they should extend further back for more support - Gear shifters are on the bars' straight; not integrated in the brake levers - Foot holsters not that solid - Beginners beware: adjustments needed for brakes, gears, bars, etc.
customer_reviews.author: tpkelsall

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike! Got a "deal of the day" for $340. What a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the great price. However, you'll need to have the gears and brakes adjusted by a professional.
customer_reviews.author: freed

customer_reviews.title: I like the bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my starter bike.Great for the price ,really pretty good looking too.Was pretty easy to put together probably should get it tuned at a bike shop but i haven't yet done it.If you are looking for a starter bike on a budget this is a good one.
customer_reviews.author: itsme24543

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. Couldn't be happier. Went for 30 miles on it on one trip. I could never do that with my old mountain bike.
customer_reviews.author: Temsha Sanaie

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not in love
customer_reviews.text: Bad breaks. Not very responsive. But it is light and does ride pretty well. The breaks really bother me though. Unsure if I would buy again or recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: tmwalsh88

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. One tube had a hole in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry B Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent beginner bike
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent beginner bike, I hit a car because he drove in the bike lane. Completely his fault but the bike only had the front rim bent. Def good material
customer_reviews.author: Malkit gill

customer_reviews.title: Recently purchased the bike and was impressed with the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased the bike and was impressed with the quality and overall look. A few issues from the shipment were resolved quickly and to my complete satisfaction. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price!! I am keeping up with my husband now with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: A. Austin

customer_reviews.title: I have enjoyed riding it every day
customer_reviews.text: This bike is exactly what I thought it would be. I have enjoyed riding it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: really good beginners bike
customer_reviews.text: Excellent beginners bike. only thing I really miss the brakes on the straight bar and the gear shifters are far because they are not integrated. However, for the quality and price I highly recommend this bike.
customer_reviews.author: Home owner

customer_reviews.title: So far.. no need to buy an expensive ...
customer_reviews.text: So far.. no need to buy an expensive bike... rides smooth and i can reach up to 15 Mph straight without much effort
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. 60 years old male 245lbs 6ft. Simple to put together and takes very little time to do so. I did take the pedal stirrups off as I do not like riding with them. They are very simple to remove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beginner rider and I love this bike
customer_reviews.text: I have ridden the bike for more than 300 miles and the tires have held up which I was worried about based of other peoples reviews. I had to redo the tension on the spokes of the front wheel from the get go, but everything else was fine. I'm only a beginner biker and have really enjoyed this bike. It replaces a cheaper used cragslist/Walmart bike I had bought before to get into biking. I have taken this bike on day trips of 60 miles and never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ledjan Qato

customer_reviews.title: Right side crank broke within 30 miles. Lots of ...
customer_reviews.text: Right side crank broke within 30 miles. Lots of hills where I live and I was definitely riding hard. I just expected this to be a more quality product. This wasn't build to handle strong, fast riding.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: So far I like the bike
customer_reviews.text: So far I like the bike. It's very light wieght and likes to move right along. But, the brakes definetly need to be adjusted as well as the gears. Also, my bike came with some scratches which I thought was very dissapointing. I don't care for the straps on the petals...personal preference thing for me.
customer_reviews.author: Nythawk6

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike. Nice and light
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bike. Nice and light, and looks good. Great for the price point. Only minor issue was a piece fell off the handlebar, on the 3rd ride but overall the bike is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: tortoise77

customer_reviews.title: Great starter bike. Few cheap parts. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Great started road bike. My wife is 5'7' (174cm) and she loves it. Components are solid. I wouldn't ride it across the country but its got about 100 miles on it and no failures. I did replace the pedals and brake pads right away, they are very cheap. There were no other bikes for this price with carbon front forks.
customer_reviews.author: K S

customer_reviews.title: 1/4 mile and already had a flat tire
customer_reviews.text: Put all of 1/4 mile on the bike and the front tire now has a flat.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Wood

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It's been said that if you're just dabbling with the concept of road cycling, then this bike will work. For the money, perhaps that's correct. After 500+miles of solid riding, I can safely say that this bike is garbage. I now understand what quality, or lack there of, means. the gears are extremely low end, and they slip like they're made of banana peels. Tires are paper thin. Everything is coach class.Do not get this bike if you like cycling already or want to get "back into it". It will disappoint. It's better to apply this $299 to a bike in the $600 range.
customer_reviews.author: Westcoaster

customer_reviews.title: Be smart. Pay under $500 and get this $1
customer_reviews.text: Be smart. Pay under $500 and get this $1,300 bike with a smooth and precise ride. I assembled it at home then brought it to a bike shop for final adjustments (e.g., brakes and derailleur) for an extra $60. You're unlikely to find a better value ever.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Best road bike for the price, all things considered
customer_reviews.text: You just can't get a better bicycle for this price, period. Not the lightest, but very lightweight. The only thing I may switch out in the future are the caliper brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Olavesen

customer_reviews.title: Best buy.
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level road bike, Best one out there for that kind of money
customer_reviews.author: Thomas L. Coe

customer_reviews.title: A very good bike, especially as a starter road bike
customer_reviews.text: A very good bike, especially as a starter road bike. Assembly was very easy. The only downside was that the the tubes are very cheap and immediately popped on my first ride. After upgrading the tubes I have had no issue with the bike
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Hard to locate serial number. Hidden by cover.
customer_reviews.text: Love the slick look of the bike. Excellent handling and breaking system.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Almost 100mi and no complaints yet. Solid and very smooth. Excellent price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: patrick c long

customer_reviews.title: Bike arrived broken. Gears don't work.
customer_reviews.text: Bike arrived broken (I ordered the bike assembly service and the technician confirmed). The bike gears did not work. Waiting for a replacement now. Very disappointing. Hopefully the replacement works...
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Bike has been great so far
customer_reviews.text: Bike has been great so far. Have put over 400 miles on it in 2 months. Assembly was easy. It's lightweight and rides nice
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: WIN, flat tire but WIN
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike. Even though my first order had a flat tire, it was replaced quickly by Amazon. I have racked up over 40 miles in just 2 weeks. I'm a beginner in biking but this has made the process quite enjoyable.
customer_reviews.author: PD

product_meta.title: Schwinn Phocus 1400 and 1600 Drop Bar Road Bicycle for Men and Women, Alluminum Frame, 14 or 16-Speed Drivetrain, Carbon Fiber Fork, 700c Wheels, Multiple Colors
product_meta.description: Designed for speed and the sport of competitive racing. They have lightweight frames and components with minimal accessories drop handlebars to allow for a powerful and aerodynamic riding position, narrow high pressure tires for minimal rolling resistance and multiple gears.
feature_bullets: Schwinn aluminum road frame with Carbon fiber road fork
Shimano Claris 16 speed derailleur with Micro shift integrated shift/brake lever combo
High profile alloy double wall rims with paired spokes are lightweight and strong with front Quick release
Promax alloy dual pivot caliper road brakes for great breaking power
Alloy crank for wide gear range
